text: Betula szaferi is a proposed species of plant in the Betulaceae family, but it is otherwise a local form of Betula pendula. It would have been endemic to Poland. No wild subpopulations are presently known, but there is a specimen planted in Kraków Botanical Garden. ==Sources== * szaferi Category:Endemic flora of Poland Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Betula szaferi
